entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 9.9°C

Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
